title: Dermorganic Firm Hold Volume Foam with Argan Oil for Unisex, 5 Ounce
description: Ecological Volume Foam is a thick hair mousse. Spreads easily to provide incredible root lift, curl separation and support. Thickens and amplifies for lustrous, voluminous styles. Alcohol-free for your hair and the air.All day root lifting powerThickens and amplifiesDefines curls and wavesFor volume, support and shineMaintains style after brushingHumidity resistantHeat protectionWith color guardsAlcohol-free, non-aerosolEnriched with Omega-6, Lipids, Anitoxidants, Vitamin E and Panthenol

title: DermOrganic BackBar Kit w/ Shampoo 33.8oz, Masque 33oz & Oil Treatment
description:
Backbar Kit contains 

(1) DermOrganic Conditioning Shampoo, 33.8 fl. oz, 
(1) DermOrganic Intensive Hair Repair Masque, 33.8 fl. oz., and 
(1) DermOrganic Leave-In Treatment, 4.0 fl. oz.

Conditioning Shampoo 33.8 fl. oz.:

- Gentle sulfate-free formula
- Made with amino acid and essential fatty acid cleaners
- Rich luxurious lather that makes other sulfate-free shampoo jealous!
- Revitalizes treated hair
- Enriched with omega-6, antioxidants, essential lipids, vitamin E and rice amino acids
- Made with certified Argan oil of Morocco

Intensive Hair Repair Masque 33.8 fl. oz.:

- Repairs damaged hair; - Smoothes and softens
- Strengthens and texturizes
- Makes hair manageable again
- Enriched with omega-6, antioxidants, essential lipids and rice amino acids
- Made with certified Argan oil of Morocco

Leave-in Treatment 4.0 fl. oz.:

- Adds incredible softness and shine
- Protects from thermal damage
- Speeds drying time up to 30%
- Revitalizes damaged hair
- Enriched with omega-6, antioxidants and vitamin E
- Made with certified Argan oil of Morocco

DermOrganic Backbar Kit 3 Piece

title: L'Oreal Paris EverCreme Sulfate-Free Moisture System Cleansing Conditioner, 8.3 Fluid Ounce
description: Evercreme is the first sulfate-free moisture lock system that delivers lush 48-hour hydration without heavy coating waxes. Rich in natural omega 3-9.
